title: Vo WI-FI calling on Pixel XL
content:
Why pixel XL is not supporting voWiFi calls on Jio or Airtel Network?  Is that a problem with Google or with the carrier?

When I check *#*#4636#*#* from the dialer, I could see inside the phone information section, voWiFi enabled toggle button is greyed out. From which I guess, at least the phone supports the technology.

Who has to take the next step..?? Is it the carrier or the device manufacturer.!!!
